AbilityScoreFeature.Name: Ability Score Increase
AbilityScoreFeature.Text: Your Dexterity and Wisdom scores each increase by 1.

SkillProficiencyFeature.Name: Forest Folk
SkillProficiencyFeature.Text: You have profciency in the Survival skill.

SpeedFeature.Name: Fleet of Foot
SpeedFeature.Text: Your base walking speed is 40 feet.

Feature.Name: Sure-Footed
Feature.Text: When you use the Dash action, difficult terrain doesn’t cost you extra movement on that turn.

Feature.Name: Spring Attack
Feature.Text: When you make a melee attack against a creature, you don’t provoke opportunity attacks from that creature for the rest of your turn, whether you hit or not.

SubRace.Name: Kessig
SubRace.Description: For the Kessiger, life is work. Kessigers are farmers, millers, weavers, and stonemasons, living close to the land and working hard for every meal. This makes them self-reliant, pragmatic, and plainspoken.
